name: Devesh Laungani
bio: Devesh is a senior majoring in Computer Science. He is very interested in developing mobile apps for IOS. As an avid hacker, he can be seen at hackathons trying to come up with innovative ideas to make an impact on people's daily lives. As an outdoor enthusiast, he currently leads the Outdoor Adventures club on campus. His hobbies include biking and you can often see him speeding across campus.
